participant_1.background:
I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind
I write poems about my life and my culture.
my favorite show is csi.
i am buying a house.
I want to learn how to be more assertive in my business.

participant_2.background:
My prized possession is my guitar, because it allows me to express my creativity and share my music with the world.
I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here.
My family is my everything.
i have bowled a 300 game twice in my life.
I balance my busy schedule by taking classes in the morning, working in the afternoon, and skiing in the evening.

content.text: What are you up to this evening?
I'm taking classes in the morning, then working in the afternoon, and skiing in the evening! How about you?
I'm just hanging out at home. I'm looking forward to moving into my new house next month.
That sounds exciting! I love moving into a new place. It's like a fresh start.
Me too! I'm going to be putting a lot of my own touches on it. I'm a big fan of the show CSI.
CSI is one of my favorites too! I love all the different cases they solve.
I know, right? It's so interesting to see how they put all the pieces together.
I wish I could be a detective. I love solving mysteries.
Me too! Maybe we could solve a crime together sometime.
That would be fun! We could be partners in crime.
I'm on it! We'll be unstoppable.
